mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(category, sub_category, title, content, writer) values(#{category}, #{sub_category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 and category = #{category} order by bno desc
select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 and sub_category = #{sub_category} and category = #{category} order by bno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_board set view = view + 1 where bno = #{bno};
update tbl_board set recomend = recomend + 1 where bno = #{bno};
